verses.name: 2 Samuel 19:1
verses.text: And it was told Joab, Behold, the king weepeth and mourneth for Absalom.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 19:2
verses.text: And the victory that day was turned into mourning unto all the people: for the people heard say that day how the king was grieved for his son.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 19:3
verses.text: And the people gat them by stealth that day into the city, as people being ashamed steal away when they flee in battle.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 19:4
verses.text: But the king covered his face, and the king cried with a loud voice, O my son Absalom, O Absalom, my son, my son!
